Class Question

java.lang.Object
Question
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ArtsQuestion, FootballQuestion, ScienceQuestion, SkiQuestion, SwimmingQuestion
public abstract class Question extends Object implements Serializable
Class to manage questions
